testcase.name: Either function should create Either pattern
Literal function should create Literal pattern
Optional function should create Optional pattern
OneOrMore function should create OneOrMore pattern
ZeroOrMore function should create ZeroOrMore pattern
Exactly function should create Exactly pattern
Range function should create Range pattern
AtLeast function should create AtLeast pattern
Sequence function should create Sequence pattern

failure.message:
Condition not satisfied:
pattern.toRegex() == 'hello world' | | | | | false | | 3 differences (78% similarity) | | he(\\)l(\\)lo wor(\\)ld | | he(-~)l(-~)lo wor(-~)ld | he\l\lo wor\ld he\l\lo wor\ld

Condition not satisfied:
pattern.toRegex() == 'hello world' | | | | | false | | 3 differences (78% similarity) | | he(\\)l(\\)lo wor(\\)ld | | he(-~)l(-~)lo wor(-~)ld | he\l\lo wor\ld he\l\lo wor\ld
at io.nextflow.pregex.PRegExExtensionTest.Sequence function should create Sequence pattern(PRegExExtensionTest.groovy:91)

testcase.name: AnyChar function should create AnyChar pattern
Digit function should create Digit pattern
WordChar function should create WordChar pattern
Whitespace function should create Whitespace pattern
StartOfLine function should create StartOfLine pattern
EndOfLine function should create EndOfLine pattern
CharClass function should create CharClass pattern
NotCharClass function should create negated CharClass pattern
Chaining with built-in methods should work

failure.message:
Condition not satisfied:
pattern.toRegex() == 'sample\\d' | | | | samp\le\d false samp\le\d 1 difference (88% similarity) samp(\\)le\\d samp(-~)le\\d

testcase.failure:
